author: Jared Diamond
title: Villanova Turns to Defense in Run to Final Four
text:
BOSTON—All season long, as Villanova steamrolled the competition with its supercharged offensive attack and established itself as a serious championship contender, coach Jay Wright tried to dispel his players’ increasingly lofty aspirations. The Wildcats, Wright said Sunday after they advanced to the Final Four, “were not a good defensive team for most of the year”—certainly not good enough to achieve what they wanted to achieve.
